content:
Sure, I'd be happy to assist you in writing your paper. Here are some general recommendations for writing a proceeding paper:

1. Define the problem: Start by defining the problem you are trying to solve, in this case, the need to reset engineering education to take advantage of digital transformation. State the current challenges faced by engineering educators and students in light of the current digital landscape.
2. Introduce the proposed solution: Discuss how digital transformation can be leveraged to improve teaching and learning in engineering education. Provide a brief overview of the various technologies and strategies that can be used to achieve this goal.
3. Describe the methodology: Describe the methodology you used to conduct your research. If you conducted a study or survey, provide details on how you gathered data and analyzed it. If you conducted a literature review, provide details on how you identified and analyzed the relevant literature.
4. Present your findings: Present the findings of your study or literature review. Use data and evidence to support your claims and show how digital transformation can help reset engineering education. Be sure to highlight any notable trends or patterns that emerged from your research.
5. Discuss the implications: Discuss the implications of your findings and how they can be applied in practice. Provide specific recommendations for engineering educators and administrators on how to leverage digital transformation to improve teaching and learning in engineering education.
6. Conclusion: Summarize your findings and conclusions, and reiterate the importance of resetting engineering education to take advantage of digital transformation.

As you continue to consult me regarding the details, feel free to ask specific questions or seek feedback on your writing.
